thread.title: Runaway Tire DESTROYS Random Soul On The Street, But He Survived So It’s Cool, Maybe
thread.title_full: Runaway Tire DESTROYS Random Soul On The Street, But He Survived So It’s Cool, Maybe

author: Smitty
title: Runaway Tire DESTROYS Random Soul On The Street, But He Survived So It’s Cool, Maybe
text:
Runaway Tire DESTROYS Random Soul On The Street, But He Survived So It’s Cool, Maybe Smitty | Email 
Well you can say it hasn’t been a GoodYear for this guy. Hey . Look, there’s fate, and then there’s Final Destination level of destiny from which there is no escape. I don’t want to say this guy had it coming, but there are forces of nature above us all that make these kinds of decisions. There is no way this was a random occurrence and not an act of God. This was just the Almighty overcompensating and trying to make his punishment a little too spontaneous. Also, there’s no way he should be sitting up after a minute or so, let alone still have his head connected to his body. The fact his head didn’t squash like a melon upon impact with the ground defies both physics and human anatomy. There should’ve been an explosion the likes of a Michael Bay movie on that pavement. 
But good on him for, you know, not dying. Tires, man. The sneakiest bastards this side of chlamydia. Smitty |
